Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
I was doubtful at first as well. How could we live without the protection of the gods?
But after I accepted the truth and looked back on myself, I started seeing something new. We had been ready to improve ourselves. The only thing holding us back was the memory of the limit set by the gods...
I'm sure now. And I can teach you how to get stronger without the help of the gods. Do you wish to know?
